details.name: Makoto Edamura
details.desc: Makoto Edamura (枝村真人, Edamura Makoto), also known as Edamame, is the main protagonist of the Great Pretender anime. He is the self-proclaimed greatest con-man in Japan and a member of Team Confidence.

details.name: Laurent Thierry
details.desc: Laurent Thierry (ローラン・ティエリー, Rōran Tierī) is an expert international con man, renowned for his persuasiveness and quick wit.

details.name: Abigail Jones
details.desc: Abigail "Aby" Jones (アビゲイル・ジョーンズ, Abigeiru Jōnzu) is an athletic, taciturn woman who is Laurent's second-in-command and member of Team Confidence.

details.name: Cynthia Moore
details.desc: Cynthia Moore (シンシア・ムーア, Shinshia Mūa) is a Con Artist and a member of Team Confidence.

details.name: Kudo
details.desc: Kudo (工藤, Kudō) is Makoto Edamura's partner in crime and member of Team Confidence.

details.name: Shi-won Kim
details.desc: Shi-won Kim (キム シウォン, Kimu Shiu-on) is a supporting character in Great Pretender. She is a con-woman and member of Team Confidence.

details.name: Eddie Cassano
details.desc: Eddie Cassano (エディ カッサーノ, Edi Kassāno) is the antagonist for Case 1 in Great Pretender.

details.name: Salazar
details.desc: Salazar (サラザール, Sarazāru) is a supporting character in Great Pretender. He once had worked for Eddie Cassano.

details.name: Tom
details.desc: Tom (トム, Tomu?) is a minor character in Great Pretender and son of Salazar.

details.name: Sam Ibrahim
details.desc: Sam Ibrahim (サム・イブラヒム, Samu Iburahimu) is a supporting character in the Great Pretender anime. He is the older brother of the pilot Clark and runs the Pathfinder Air Race.

details.name: Clark Ibrahim
details.desc: Clark Ibrahim (クラーク・イブラヒム, Kurāku Iburahimu) is a supporting character in the Great Pretender anime. He is a pilot and the younger brother of Sam.

details.name: Lewis Mueller
details.desc: Lewis Mueller (ルイス・ミューラー, Ruisu Myūrā) is a supporting character in the Great Pretender anime. He is a former pilot in the Pathfinder Air Race. His spouse is Isabelle Mueller.

details.name: Isabelle Mueller
details.desc: Isabelle Mueller (イザベル・ミューラー, Izaberu Myūrā) is a supporting character in the Great Pretender anime.

details.name: James Coleman
details.desc: James Coleman (ジェームス・コールマン, Jēmusu Kōruman) is a support character in the Great Pretender anime.

details.name: Thomas Meyer
details.desc: Thomas Meyer (トーマス・メイヤー, Tōmasu Meiyā?) is a supporting character in the Great Pretender anime. He is an artist.

details.name: Tim
details.desc: Tim is a minor character in the Great Pretender anime. He is the butler of Farrah.

details.name: Sebastien
details.desc: Sebastien (セバスチャン, Sebasuchan) is a support character in the Great Pretender anime. He is a boarding house owner and the father of Marie.

details.name: Marie
details.desc: Marie (マリー, Marī) is a support character in the Great Pretender anime.

details.name: Farrah Brown
details.desc: Farrah Brown (ファラ・ アラウン) is a supporting character in the Great Pretender anime.

details.name: Akemi Suzaku
details.occupation: Ceo of a sketchy trading company
details.desc: Akemi Suzaku (朱雀アケミ, Suzaku Akemi) is the ceo of a trading company.

details.name: Ishigami
details.occupation: Manager of a sketchy trading company
details.desc: Ishigami (朱雀アケミ, Suzaku Akemi?) is a trading company manager.

details.name: Liu Xiao
details.desc: Liu Xiao (劉萧, Liú Xiao) is a character in the Great Pretender.

details.name: Chen Yao
details.desc: Chen Yao (陳堯, Chen Yáo) is a character in the Great Pretender.

details.name: Seiji Ozaki
details.desc: Seiji Ozaki (尾崎誠司, Ozaki Seiji?) is a supporting character in the Great Pretender anime.

details.name: Dorothy
details.desc: Dorothy (ディアボロ, Dorothy?) is Laurent Thierry's ex-lover and partner.
